reviewtext: My sister bought this lock for me as I will be going off to college soon. I have a 2011 aluminum 15" MacBook Pro & this lock works well with it. It took a while to get it to work, but after reading reviews I found out that you have to align the little "T" on the lock with the 2 poles by inserting the key & then turning it rightwards. Once you have done that you can just insert it into your laptop & give the key a slight turn! The cable also seems like it would be pretty sturdy to discourage the average thief.
